metadata.Title: CVE-2018-21009 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Poppler before 0.66.0 has an integer overflow in Parser::makeStream inParser.cc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-21009` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.15
libpoppler-cpp0 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.15
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.15
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.15
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.15
libpoppler58 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.15
poppler-utils - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.15
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: poppler package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.41.0-0ubuntu1.15').
